metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2763 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The WP Socializer WordPress plugin before 7.3 does not sanitise and escapesome of its Icons settings, which could allow high privilege users such asadmin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when theunfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
